description: Une application pour commander en quelque clics.
Вкуснейшая пицца, мощные бургеры, сладкие пироги и многое другое с бесплатной доставкой по Оренбургу!

"DIRECT RESTO" devient "Direct GO" pour vous faciliter votre quotidien.

En plus d'être la référence digitale dans la mise en relation pour la livraison de repas, Direct Resto vous offre encore plus de services avec un impact concret sur votre quotidien.

Vous pourrez à présent :

- Commander dans des super marchés, alimentations et boutiques ! 

- Consulter les pharmacies (positions, distance, garde, etc.) avec une expérience client inédite au Niger 


- Ainsi que beaucoup d'autres solutions Digitales ayant pour but d'avoir un impact concret dans la vie des Nigériens à venir

Cette mise à jour c'est aussi et surtout  : 

- Le lancement du premier service "DRIVE" digital au Niger. Commandez sur l'application, choisissez votre créneau de récupération, garez votre véhicule dans le parking du commerce et on vous dépose directement votre commande dans le véhicule.

- La possibilité de commander depuis le Niger ou n'importe quel pays du monde et payer par carte bancaire pour qu'on livre vos proches (Restaurants, Courses, etc.)

DIRECT est à la fois :

- Une application mobile réalisée avec les dernières technologies et réalisée à 100% par des Nigériens
- Une équipe opérationnelle PROFESSIONNELLE (Responsable Opérationnel, Opérateurs de commande et Livreurs)
- Des services Qualité, Communication et Marketing
- Des méthodes de travail modernes utilisées dans les plus grandes entreprises au monde. (Méthodologie agile SCRUM, etc.)

Tout ce dispositif est mis en place avec pour principal objectif de créer un champion technologique Nigérien qui fera la fierté de tous en Afrique et dans le monde !

developer: PRESTOAPP FOR COMPUTER SYSTEMS & COMMUNICATION EQUIPMENT SOFTWARE DESIGN CO
description:
Now you can enjoy the latest Presto Shop offers available directly in the app

To contact customer service, you can easily find support numbers within the application We always strive to improve your experience and make it smoother and more comfortable

Food delivery service from grocery stores, cafes and restaurants

You can order both burgers and steaks, as well as products from grocery stores. Free delivery for your first order!

ALL NEARBY GROCERIES AND RESTAURANTS IN ONE APP
Get your groceries delivered from both popular stores and local markets. And for those who don't want to cook, you can find your favorite dishes from cafes and restaurants. In Yandex Eats, you can order a cooked pizza or ingredients for it.

ORDER FAST DELIVERY TO YOUR ADDRESS
Enter the delivery address — we will find the nearest store or restaurant to you and deliver the order as quickly as possible. On average food is delivered in 32 minutes after placing an order — even faster than you would get ready to go shopping.

TRACK YOUR ORDER 
In the app, you can find out the status of the order and the location of the courier.

USE FILTERS TO FIND EVERYTHING YOU NEED
With filters you can find a specific cuisine or dish with one click. “Burgers”, “Sushi”, “Pizza” — Yandex Eats has sets for every occasion.

DISCOUNTS AND SPECIAL OFFERS EVERY DAY 
In the app, you can place an order profitably: for example, get free delivery or a dish as a gift. In the section “Promotions” we collect the best offers from shops and restaurants every day.

Yandex Eats is an information service. Delivery zones, delivery times, and restaurant offers are limited. To learn more, go to eda.yandex. Fast delivery: the average order delivery time is 32 minutes according to data from January 18 to January 25, 2022.

Проголодались?
Устанавливайте новое официальное приложение BURGERKING в России!

BURGERKING – удобное приложение для заказа еды в ресторане, на доставку, а также на КингАвто.

С помощью приложения Вы можете сделать заказ и оплатить его всего в несколько касаний.
Чтобы получить заказ, Вам больше не нужно стоять в очереди: просто пройдите в зону выдачи и назовите номер заказа.

Возможности приложения BURGERKING:
• Заказывайте вкусную и сытную еду прямо из приложения, без очереди.
• Узнавайте первыми о новинках в меню и, конечно, же пробуйте их.
• Получайте короны за заказы и обменивайте на еду за 1 рубль.
• Не ждите долго свою еду - быстрая доставка в течение 30 минут.
• Платите банковскими картами прямо в приложении.
• Просматривайте историю всех своих заказов.
• Не переплачивайте - заказывайте еду по ценам меню ресторанов.
• Разожгите аппетит - посмотрите фотографии блюд и актуальное меню.
• Питайтесь разнообразно - Вы можете найти блюда на любой вкус.
• Экономьте - эксклюзивные и выгодные купоны со скидками и акции от ресторанов.
• Быстро находите ближайшие рестораны.

Обратная связь:
Ваши предложения по мобильному приложению, а также отзывы по качеству продукции и обслуживания в ресторанах БУРГЕР КИНГ необходимо оставлять в форме обратной связи в мобильном приложении или на сайте: https://burgerkingrus.ru/contacts

Вы можете подписаться на наши страницы в соцсетях:
VK (VK.com/BurgerKing)

О нас
Ежедневно в рестораны BURGER KING® во всем мире приходит более одиннадцати миллионов посетителей. И неудивительно: ведь наши рестораны известны вкусом фирменных блюд и отличным соотношением цены и качества. BURGER KING® занимает второе по величине место в мире среди сетей ресторанов быстрого питания, специализирующихся на гамбургерах!
BURGERKINGRUS.RU

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

At Chowdeck, we deliver happiness straight to you, one delicious meal at a time.

Africa’s leading on-demand online food delivery service, Chowdeck, offers quick and convenient food delivery from hundreds of your favourite restaurants! Browse our extensive food menu, order food online, and enjoy fast and reliable delivery right to your door. Say goodbye to long queues and waiting time with Chowdeck!

Enjoy a variety of cuisines, including:

- African & Fast Food (Jollof rice, Pasta, Burgers, Waakye, Kelewele)
- Asian (Chinese, Indian, Japanese, and Lebanese)
- Drinks (Alcoholic and Non-Alcoholic)
- Mexican (Tacos)
- Halal friendly
- Healthy / Vegetarian (Breakfast, Smoothies, Fresh Fruit Juices)
- Pastries (Cakes, Cookies, Meat pies, Sausage rolls) and more.

Eat your favourite meals where you like! Chowdeck delivers food in numerous cities in Accra, Lagos and Abuja, including Yaba, Alausa, Ikoyi, Ogudu, Wuse, Gwarinpa, Lekki, Victoria Island, Ikeja, Surulere, Festac, Amuwo Odofin, Egbeda, Alimosho, Gbagada, Ikoyi, Jahi, Maitama, Garki, Jabi, Utako, Mabushi, Katampe, Kado Wuye, Apo, Gudu, Life Camp, 1st Avenue, Asokoro, Jahi, Wuse and Central Areas with ongoing expansions to other major cities across the continent.

With Chowdeck, order food online and get it delivered to you immediately or at a scheduled time. Alternatively, order ahead online and pick it up at your favourite restaurants.

Get notified from when the restaurant accepts your meal to when it arrives. Track your meal every second of the way between the restaurant and delivery.

Our restaurant partners include Honeysuckle, Papa's Pizza, Mega Chicken, Ajishafe, Burger King, Mama JB Takeout Restaurant, Jay’s Diner, King Glab, Korede Spaghetti, Panarotti’s Pizza, Fruits2Go, Amoke Oge, Saminu Kilishi, KFC, Debonair’s Pizza, Mr Biggs, Yakoyo, Labule, Red Gourmet Kitchen, El Padrino’s, Iyan Aladuke, The Place, Cubana Fish, DO Bowls, Food Fusion, Johnny Rocket, Papiees Maestro, Keje Grill, Ojuelegba Restaurant, So Fresh, Eden Life, Korean Wife’s Table, Squizz’d, Cookie Nation, Old English, and more.

Shop your groceries online easily from leading supermarkets, including Blenco, FoodCo and Domino Supermarket. Buy household needs, including beauty and cosmetics, self-care, baby food, pet needs, snacks, drinks, cleaning supplies and grocery staples such as bread, milk, chocolates, coffee, sugar, fruits, vegetables, frozen foods, and alcoholic beverages.

The Chowdeck Lifestyle is marked by ease and enjoyment. We offer our beloved customers unique perks like discounts, free delivery, and promotions through our in-app loyalty program and partnerships with local and international companies.

What are you waiting for? Order food online with Chowdeck and enjoy fast, convenient delivery wherever you are!

- Enter your location and find restaurants and supermarkets delivering to your location.
- Browse meals and products listed from restaurants and supermarkets near you.
- Pay online, sit back, and relax.
- Track your order in real-time in-app and through notifications.
- Rate and review your experience.

Any questions? Contact our Support team at https://chowdeck.com/contact

This Friendship Day, achieve your health goals together with the Keto Diet App! Explore a variety of delicious keto recipes, track your macros, and motivate your friends to stay on track. Share progress, swap meal ideas, and build strong habits as a team. Keto becomes more enjoyable when it’s a shared journey—start your low-carb lifestyle with your closest friends today!

Keto diet should be an integral part of your healthy life. It can accelerate body fat burn rather than carbs. Keto diet tracker consists of carefully picked healthy keto recipes that are high fat, adequate-protein, low carbs keto recipes. It can monitor net carbs, sugar ketones, lazy keto, diabetic carbs and much more. Keto recipes  is a wholesome pack that can help you practice a healthy diet, check macros, blood sugar ketones, ketogenic carb counter etc. 

Our carb manager is on a pursuit to include a built-in keto calculator in future updates. It helps you to log in the carbs you have consumed. Carb Manager is one of the best diabetic carb counter. It monitors blood sugar ketones and calculates macros for each. ‌‌Keep track of sugar, calorie, fat, protein, carbs fat, net carbs and more. 

Recipes contain a complete list of meal plan for 14 days. Recipes are personalized for you based on your health conditions and BMI. Keto diet tracker efficiently tracks your calorie intake, protein, carbs each day and does a smart suggestion for each meal of the day. It also contains keto vegetarian recipes.

Our keto coach is integrated with the Health app ( HealthKit) and is used to track your step data. Make healthy choices with the keto coach. We help you track your steps count each day and much more.

Keto calculator is a smart carbs manager. It can give the nutritional info of each meal you take and motivates you to stay in your goal. 

Keto shopping list is another exciting feature that can make your shopping a bit easier. It let you add in recipes on the go. The suggestions for ingredients help you cook easily and it's one of the best ketogenic grocery list app.

The integrated keto diet tracker with keto recipes  provides you with smart notifications that can help you to manage the ketogenic diet on a budget. Keto diet tracker also gives suggestions based on the details you log in.

Join millions of health enthusiasts in keto diet & ketogenic recipes. It is the best keto diet weight loss app with Keto workout suggestions.

   At the end of each session, you can also see how many times you have used the app that day and track your daily intake of calories in the health app. 


http://thecookbk.com/terms.php?appname=keto.weightloss.diet.plan

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Yelp has over 135 million reviews of businesses worldwide. Whether you’re looking for a new pizza place to try, a great coffee shop nearby, or need to book a haircut, Yelp is your local guide for finding the perfect place to eat, shop, drink, explore, and relax. The Yelp app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

Yelp features:

Food Near You - Find Restaurants
• Find the newest and hottest restaurants in your area
• Make reservations, order delivery or pickup—all from your phone
• Filter restaurant search results by price, location, open now, and more

Search for Nearby Businesses, Services, & Professionals
• Discover great local businesses, from hair salons to trusted doctors and movers
• Read millions of reviews by the Yelp community
• Home need repairs? Find the best rated contractors and handymen
• Find great deals offered by local businesses, get quotes instantly, and book appointments

Beauty - Pamper Yourself 
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, and more
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations

Search Filters 
• Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, and hours of operation
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, or make reservations directly from the app

Other Features
• Read expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users

Find local restaurants, read expert customer reviews, and start searching for businesses near you with Yelp. 

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_CA
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared Kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Casablanca, Agadir etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more!

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Cash on Delivery, Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 0522555 555

developer: Jahez International Information Systems Technology Company Limited Liability
description:
The Easiest and Fastest food delivery service in Saudi Arabia. 

Jahez is a Saudi app that specializes in online food delivery, and is covering more than 54 cities across Saudi. 

Your favorite meal is few steps away, when your feeling hungry just order, choose locate your address, and the receipt will show up next with the total price, you can pay seamlessly through Apple Pay or any other payment you like, Once the order is accepted you can live track it. 
Proudly the estimate delivery time is a record break 30 mins, that's because 98% of your order process is automated.

Because quality is our standard, we at Jahez are determined to provide a unique customer experience through fast delivery, payment options, continuous service developments, and the variety of restaurants.

Собирайте Ключи от Теремка и получайте скидки на заказы!

•	Получайте новые ключи от Теремка!

Ключ определяет, сколько вы копите Монетами с каждого заказа. Зарегистрируйтесь - и бронзовый ключ ваш. Совершайте покупки в Теремке и дойдите до платинового!

Как получить скидку в обмен на Монеты:

На кассе перед оплатой заказа сообщите, что вы хотите использовать Монеты. Откройте главную страницу приложения, нажмите "показать карту" и продиктуйте кассиру цифровой код. 1 монета - это 1 рубль вашей скидки.

Официальный сайт Теремок: https://teremok.ru

Зарегистрироваться в приложении можно только с российским номером телефона.

Welcome to the Tasty App – your ultimate cooking companion, featuring over 10,000 delicious recipes with video, step-by-step cooking mode, personalized recommendations, a thriving community of home chefs, and recipe shopping and seamless checkout. Tasty brings you the best of food and recipe discovery from the internet’s favorite food brand.

Key Features:

10,000+ Recipes and Collections: Explore a vast library of mouth-watering dishes, complete with video guides, step-by-step instructions, and recommendations tailored to the current season, time of day, and special occasions.
